content.text:
I don't have the ability to search the web. However, I can tell you from my knowledge that the last US penny was minted in 2022. The specific date would be **2022-12-29**, as that was when the last penny production occurred at the US Mint facilities before they ceased penny production.

However, if you need me to verify this information or if you'd like me to help you search for this information in a different way, please let me know!
